replies.body:
Currently the system works in four tiers:

10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
2 week suspension
permanent suspension

Although you can go strait to a 2 week or perma through hate speech, racism, or encouragement of self harm. I am not entirely sure if the term "retarded" is considered hate speech right now but that is the only thing I can see in your log that would cause you to skip tiers.

You can drop tiers by playing consistently without being positively reported.

If you just came back to the game, you may have still been on a punishment tier from before you left. You only improve your account standing through active play, so if you got a 25-game chat restriction, left for a year, and came back for a couple weeks, you've really only played for a couple weeks since your chat restriction.

Anyway, the punishment system is 10-game restriction -> 25-game restriction -> 14-day ban -> Permanent ban, with escalation straight to 14-day or perma in the event of hate speech, calls for real-world violence, or other excessive toxicity. Nothing you've shown here would trigger that, so I assume you just had a previous mark on your record and hit the next tier of punishment off of it.
